page.title: 05Homelife in a Village.
page.content: We surveyed the children in school to get some ideas about{homelife}as we decided that this would be the best way.{Food}is very important and most families eat together at least once a day.A lot of the{food}is convenience {food}such as frozen and tinned, although a lot of people have the chance to keep chickens and grow vegetables in their gardens.People keep dogs to protect their houses as well as burglar alarms for{safety. A lot of old people keep{pets}for company like cats,dogs,fish,mice and hamsters.When we surveyed the school we found that every one had at least one television in their home.Not as many people have videos and everyone had a radio in their home and everyone had a cassette player.The main music that people listened to was pop music and watched soap operas on television.
